content: {"locationId": "13796", "organizationId": "10807", "name": "Hope For You", "address1": "4320 HWY 380 BUS", "address2": "", "city": "Greenville", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "75401", "country": null, "phone": "817-897-4623", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.14661", "longitude": "-96.23874", "foodPrograms": "", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Collin, Dallas, Delta, Ellis, Fannin, Grayson, Hopkins, Hunt, Kaufman, Lamar, Navarro, Rockwall", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "Monthly Food Distribution takes place on the 3rd Friday of each Month from 9am-11am.  Also, Food Pantry is open on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 10am-1pm.", "contactName": "Dr. Funmilayo Adeyemi", "contactPhone": "817-897-4623", "contactEmail": "fadeyemi@hopeforyou.org", "servicePrograms": "SNAP Application Assistance", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 70, "regionName": "North Texas Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1f7441e5-926c-4c6b-bb65-394c42b141e0.png", "website": "https://ntfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
